import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{withRouter}from'react-router';// navigation link with some logic idenitfying active tab
function NavTab(props){var children=props.children,className=props.className,path=props.path,location=props.location;var currentPath=location.pathname;var active=path===currentPath;var classFinal=(className?className+" ":"")+"Navbutton"+(active?" activeTab":"");return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:path,className:classFinal},children);}export default withRouter(NavTab);
